api_list.name: Get Data
api_list.description:
GET detail profile information with phone Number
change the  phone with your phone number want to search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://truecaller-data1.p.rapidapi.com/rapid_api/truecaller/081223222224"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truecaller-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://truecaller-data1.p.rapidapi.com/rapid_api/truecaller/{phone}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truecaller-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
